Talk34:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Aww... I wanted to try to ride on one,
ZIP-ZAH.
Talk35:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Look and learn! Then you won't hate!
Understand what you fear and you'll
feel great!
For those with an open mind, wonders
always await!
Talk23:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Won't someone decorate the stage
for me?
Talk36:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you! Thank you!


Hoohoohee, the stage has gotten so very
busy. And it's all thanks to you!

Please, take this gift as a sign of
my gratitude.
Talk24:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>We went to so many troubles to get the
sculpture made.

All that's left is for it to be<clr:0000> placed upon
the stage <clr:ffff>so all the eyeballs can see it.
Talk37:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>It's something I made a long time
ago. I recommend using it on your
favorite horse.
Ah, and take this as well...
Talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>If I had that picture, the sculpture would
be son and done. But...I can't force you.
Talk38:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>For so long I've dreamed of collecting
these sculptures and showing the world
how wonderful monsters truly are.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>And now that dream is coming true...
all because of you! Thank you!
Thank you many times over!
Talk13: <sp:3:0:2:0700>Yep. Right. I'll get it built, son and done.
Talk26:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800>Ooh! OOOOOOH!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


See how it blends in there with the stage!
Exactly the kind of clever camouflage
you'd expect from a Battle Talus.
Such artistry! It's exactly what I was
hoping for.
Talk27:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>There's no way anyone would know it's a
monster at first glance.
Talk83:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Now, it would make a grin grow between
my ears if you could select the perfect
spot on the <clr:0000>stage<clr:ffff> for this sculpture.
Talk29: <sp:3:0:2:0100>Used my imagination to fill in the blanks.
Talk16:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800>Ha-hiyaay!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


I-it's perfect! This monster sculpture
doesn't have a single flaw!
Talk84:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sorry, I've got a rule against making
that kind of decision. Too much
responsibility. Not my thing.
Talk72:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If I had a <clr:0000>detailed picture<clr:ffff> of a Battle
Talus...or of some other monster...I could
make a sculpture.
Talk85:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM>Oh phooey! Your pouch is full! To the top!


I've got monster extract to give you, but
first you'll have to make room to carry it.
Talk73:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>If you have any <clr:0000>monster pictures<clr:ffff> on you,
Hudson can use them to make more
<clr:0000>sculptures<clr:ffff> for me.<sp:5:1:0> So happy I will be!
Talk86:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>Hooyagee?! <sp:5:0:0>I was going to give you
a thank-you gifty, but that pouch of
yours is full.
Make some room in there and I'll give
you the monster extract that's waiting
for you.
Talk61:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>A grin is sure to grow between my ears if
you have any <clr:0000>monster pictures <clr:ffff>Hudson
can use to make <clr:0000>sculptures<clr:ffff>.
Talk76:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You see, a <clr:0000>Battle Talus<clr:ffff> is a monster, but
it's ALSO a house. Or maybe it's a...fort?
Hmmm, well...
It's certainly a busybody in the truest
sense! That is, it allows its friends to run
about willy-nilly on its laaarge body.
Talk08:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b00>Huu...<sp:5:1:0>hayeee!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>


Th-this is the wonderful, lovable
<clr:0000>Battle Talus<clr:ffff> I was hoping for.
Talk78:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SurpriseM>Wheefoofoo! The <clr:0000>Battle Talus<clr:ffff> has inspired
you! Of course, I am happy to describe it
to you again and again and again.
0006: I found a nice spot for it.
Talk67:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Sad_00><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>*sigh* I hope I can add a Battle Talus sculpture
to my collection too.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk68:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SurpriseM>Hayaa-pweee! You'll hear my request?


In that case, a sculpture of a <clr:0000>Battle Talus<clr:ffff>
is what I desire more than anything.
Talk30:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Yes! Now let's put it before all the
eyeballs in the village.
Talk31:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hear ye, hear ye! Come, look see!


This is a Battle Talus...a creature sure to
shock you when you first meet it.

But do not fear. Draw near! This is the
only place you can safely admire such
a monster up close. The only place!
Talk32: <sp:3:0:2:0b00>Monster? It looks like a pile of rocks!
Near01: If I had a monster picture...
Talk33:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Ahem. This sight has stolen your eyes.
Now, give me your ears! All of them!

Once again, this enchanting monster is a
Battle Talus.

With a body that looks made of rock, it
doesn't mind that other monsters climb
around it and build their nests upon it.
It's a generous monster, you see, 
both in the size of its body and the
size of its heart!
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Don't you wish you, too, could live on top
of it? At the very least, I bet you wish
you could give it a hug. I know I do!
Sadly, they aren't known for enjoying
such emotional outpourings...so it's
best if you give them a wide berth.
